item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Carlos Fuentes
item.description: "Don't classify me, read me. I'm a writer, not a genre." -- Carlos Fuentes

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Carlos Fuentes
item.description: "You start by writing to live. You end by writing so as not to die." -- Carlos Fuentes

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Christopher Moore
Cynthia add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you think anyone is sane you just don't know enough about them." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Martin Niemöller
Cynthia add a quote by Angelina Jolie
item.description: "When other little girls wanted to be ballet dancers, I kind of wanted to be a vampire." -- Angelina Jolie

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "She would defend herself, saying that love, no matter what else it might be, was a natural talent. She would say: You are either born knowing how, or you never know." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "The longer I live, the more uninformed I feel. Only the young have an explanation for everything." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Like most Beta Males, he didn't realize that being a good guy was not necessarily an attraction to women." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Edward Albee
item.description: "What I mean by an educated taste is someone who has the same tastes that I have." -- Edward Albee

item.title: Cynthia add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa
